hero.description: Drag the pieces into place to complete the festive puzzle.

completion.perfectDescription:
Would you like to send your coins to OH22?
We'll convert your highest submitted amount to Euros and donate it to a good cause. ❤️
completion.perfectTryAgain: Or do you want to try again and be even faster? ⏱️🚀
completion.partialDescription:
Would you like to send them to OH22?

completion.partialTryAgain: Or do you want to try your luck again and collect even more coins? 🧩✨

Maybe it'll work better next time.

modals.explosionTitle: Oh no – our oh22 Christmas stag has fallen apart!
modals.explosionDescription: Help us put the 22 scattered pieces back together so our stag can deliver all the Christmas presents on time.

instructions.drag: Drag the pieces with the mouse to the correct position.

greeting.generic: Welcome! Have fun with the puzzle! 🎄
